lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps claimed his 23rd gold medal. Puerto Rico won its first ever. And Jamaica got its first gold of the Rio Games with an emphatic win in the marquee Olympic sprinting event.

headline.main: In Olympics, a First for Puerto Rico _ and 23rd for Phelps
headline.print_headline: In Olympics, a First for Puerto Rico _ and 23rd for Phelps
